verses.verse: I will sing <WH7891> of the loving kindness <WH2617> of Yahweh <WH3068> forever. <WH5769> With my mouth, <WH6310> I will make known <WH3045> your faithfulness <WH530> to all <WH1755> generations. <WH1755>
I indeed declare, <WH559> "Love <WH2617> stands firm <WH1129> forever. <WH5769> You established <WH3559> the heavens. <WH8064> Your faithfulness is in them. <WH530>"
"I have made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with my chosen <WH972> one, <WH7650> I have sworn to David, <WH1732> my servant, <WH5650>
<WH3559> 'I will establish your seed <WH2233> forever, <WH5704> <WH5769> and build up <WH1129> your throne <WH3678> to all <WH1755> generations. <WH1755>'" Selah. <WH5542>
The heavens <WH8064> will praise <WH3034> your wonders, <WH6382> Yahweh; <WH3068> your faithfulness <WH530> also in the assembly <WH6951> of the holy ones. <WH6918>
For who in the skies <WH7834> can be compared <WH6186> to Yahweh? <WH3068> Who among the sons <WH1121> of the heavenly <WH410> beings is like <WH1819> Yahweh, <WH3068>
a very <WH7227> awesome <WH6206> God <WH410> in the council <WH5475> of the holy <WH6918> ones, <WH3372> to be feared above all those who are around him? <WH5439>
Yahweh, <WH3068> God <WH430> of Armies, <WH6635> who is a mighty <WH2626> one, <WH3050> like you? Yah, your faithfulness <WH530> is around you. <WH5439>
You rule <WH4910> the pride <WH1348> of the sea. <WH3220> When its waves <WH1530> rise <WH7721> up, <WH7623> you calm them.
You have broken <WH1792> Rahab <WH7294> in pieces, <WH1792> like one of the slain. <WH2491> You have scattered <WH6340> your enemies <WH341> with your mighty <WH5797> arm. <WH2220>
The heavens <WH8064> are yours. <WH776> The earth also is yours; <WH8398> the world and its fullness. <WH4393> You have founded them. <WH3245>
The north <WH6828> and the south, <WH3225> you have created <WH1254> them. <WH8396> Tabor and Hermon <WH2768> rejoice <WH7442> in your name. <WH8034>
You have a mighty <WH1369> arm. <WH2220> Your hand <WH3027> is strong, <WH5810> and your right hand <WH3027> is exalted. <WH7311>
Righteousness <WH6664> and justice <WH6664> are the foundation <WH4349> of your throne. <WH3678> Loving kindness <WH2617> and truth <WH571> go <WH6923> before your face. <WH6440>
Blessed <WH835> are the people <WH5971> who learn <WH3045> to acclaim <WH8643> you. <WH1980> They walk in the light <WH216> of your presence, <WH6440> Yahweh. <WH3068>
In your name <WH8034> they rejoice <WH1523> all day. <WH3117> In your righteousness, <WH6666> they are exalted. <WH7311>
For you are the glory <WH8597> of their strength. <WH5797> In your favor, <WH7522> our horn <WH7161> will be exalted. <WH7311>
For our shield <WH4043> belongs to Yahweh; <WH3068> our king <WH4428> to the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel. <WH3478>

Then you spoke <WH1696> in vision <WH2377> to your saints, <WH2623> and said, <WH559> "I have bestowed <WH7737> strength <WH5828> on the warrior. <WH1368> I have exalted <WH7311> a young man <WH977> from the people. <WH5971>
I have found <WH4672> David, <WH1732> my servant. <WH5650> I have anointed <WH4886> him with my holy <WH6944> oil, <WH8081>
with whom my hand <WH3027> shall be established. <WH3559> My arm <WH2220> will also strengthen him. <WH553>
No enemy <WH341> will tax <WH5378> him. <WH5766> No wicked man <WH1121> will oppress him. <WH6031>
I will beat down <WH3807> his adversaries <WH6862> before him, <WH6440> and strike <WH5062> those who hate him. <WH8130>
But my faithfulness <WH530> and my loving kindness <WH2617> will be with him. <WH8034> In my name, his horn <WH7161> will be exalted. <WH7311>
I will set <WH7760> his hand <WH3027> also on the sea, <WH3220> and his right hand <WH3225> on the rivers. <WH5104>
He will call <WH7121> to me, <WH1> 'You are my Father, my God, <WH410> and the rock <WH6697> of my salvation! <WH3444>'
I will also appoint <WH5414> him my firstborn, <WH1060> the highest <WH5945> of the kings <WH4428> of the earth. <WH776>
I will keep <WH8104> my loving kindness <WH2617> for him forevermore. <WH5769> My covenant <WH1285> will stand firm with him. <WH539>
I will also make <WH7760> his seed <WH2233> endure forever, <WH5703> and his throne <WH3678> as the days <WH3117> of heaven. <WH8064>
If his children <WH1121> forsake <WH5800> my law, <WH8451> and don't <WH3212> walk in my ordinances; <WH4941>
if they break <WH2490> my statutes, <WH2708> and don't <WH8104> keep my commandments; <WH4687>
then I will punish <WH6485> their sin <WH6588> with the rod, <WH7626> and their iniquity <WH5771> with stripes. <WH5061>
But I will not completely take <WH6331> my loving kindness <WH2617> from him, <WH530> nor allow my faithfulness to fail. <WH8266>
I will not break <WH2490> my covenant, <WH1285> nor alter <WH8138> what my lips <WH8193> have uttered. <WH4161>
Once <WH259> have I sworn <WH7650> by my holiness, <WH6944> I will not lie <WH3576> to David. <WH1732>
His seed <WH2233> will endure forever, <WH5769> his throne <WH3678> like the sun before me. <WH8121>
It will be established <WH3559> forever <WH5769> like the moon, <WH3394> the faithful <WH539> witness <WH5707> in the sky. <WH7834>" Selah. <WH5542>
But you have rejected <WH2186> and spurned. <WH3988> You have been angry <WH5674> with your anointed. <WH4899>
You have renounced <WH5010> the covenant <WH1285> of your servant. <WH5650> You have defiled <WH2490> his crown <WH5145> in the dust. <WH776>
You have broken down <WH6555> all his hedges. <WH1448> You have brought <WH7760> his strongholds <WH4013> to ruin. <WH4288>
All who pass by <WH5674> the way <WH1870> rob <WH8155> him. <WH2781> He has become a reproach to his neighbors. <WH7934>
You have exalted <WH7311> the right hand <WH3225> of his adversaries. <WH6862> You have made all of his enemies <WH341> rejoice. <WH8055>
Yes, <WH7725> you turn back the edge <WH6697> of his sword, <WH2719> and haven't <WH6965> supported him in battle. <WH4421>
You have ended <WH7673> his splendor, <WH2892> and thrown <WH4048> his throne <WH3678> down <WH4048> to the ground. <WH776>
You have shortened <WH7114> the days <WH3117> of his youth. <WH5934> You have covered <WH5844> him with shame. <WH955> Selah. <WH5542>
How long, <WH3068> Yahweh? Will you hide <WH5641> yourself forever? <WH5331> Will your wrath <WH2534> burn <WH1197> like fire? <WH784>
Remember <WH2142> how short <WH2465> my time is! <WH7723> For what vanity have you created all the children <WH1121> of men! <WH1121>
What man <WH1397> is he who shall live <WH2421> and not see <WH7200> death, <WH4194> who shall deliver <WH4422> his soul <WH5315> from the power <WH3027> of Sheol? <WH7585> Selah. <WH5542>
Lord, <WH136> where are your former <WH7223> loving kindnesses, <WH2617> which you swore <WH7650> to David <WH1732> in your faithfulness? <WH530>
Remember, <WH2142> Lord, <WH136> the reproach <WH2781> of your servants, <WH5650> how I bear <WH5375> in my heart <WH2436> the taunts of all the mighty <WH7227> peoples, <WH5971>
With which your enemies <WH341> have mocked, <WH2778> Yahweh, <WH3068> with which they have mocked <WH2778> the footsteps <WH6119> of your anointed one. <WH4899>
Blessed <WH1288> be Yahweh <WH3068> forevermore. <WH5769> Amen, <WH543> and Amen. <WH543>
